About Logo

The Social Library Logo is a Falcon reading a book. Why a Falcon, you ask? Well, our modern - day student has to be no less agile then a Falcon who lives in mind numbingly chaotic world, catches up with erratically ephemeral information.Social Library - The Reading Cafe is based on the concept to embed the aspiring students with a vision to accomplish their target by providing them with soothing and peaceful environment.

Introduction

Social Library - The Reading Cafe is based on the concept to embed the aspiring students with a vision to accomplish their target by providing them with soothing and peaceful environment. People often use these words 'to have a falcon's eye on your ambition' and that what social library is all about. So, come and pursue your dreams and step into our library keeping in promise that you will develop the sharpness and focus like a falcon in your traits.

About Us

Social Library, Jammu is a well-designed fully air-conditioned study space for those preparing for career oriented competitive exams like Civil Services, Medical, IIT-JEE, CA/CS, Ph.D and college students. Our reading room is well organized having inspiring internal space, comfortable sitting, peaceful ambience and abundant facilities, along with being very economical. Now you can realize your dreams and be an achiever, while we take care of you and remove all obstacles in your path to success.

Admission

" The three most important documents a free society gives are a birth certificate, a passport and a library card"All you have to do is carry proof of residency { ID Proof. Address Proof 2 Passport size photos }. The library is free of charge, there is no registration fee, only monthly fee. As for genres, expect competitive examination books, books pertaining to law, philosophy, religion, medical science, engineering, literature, and fiction will be available soon but notes are provided on demand.
